title: Remy Ma interview and more
itunes:title: Remy Ma interview and more
description:
Thursday 11/9- Today on the show we Remy Ma stop by, where she spoke about her switching labels, clearing the rumors about her and Lil Kim's new song and more, but it wouldn't be a Remy Ma interview if she didn't throw some shade and be petty, and this time it was all towards DJ Envy. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a couple that shoots themselves in failed attempt to stage insurance claim and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one listener who needed advice on being more attractive to his partner. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 11/9- Today on the show we Remy Ma stop by, where she spoke about her switching labels, clearing the rumors about her and Lil Kim's new song and more, but it wouldn't be a Remy Ma interview if she didn't throw some shade and be petty, and this time it was all towards DJ Envy. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a couple that shoots themselves in failed attempt to stage insurance claim and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one listener who needed advice on being more attractive to his partner.
